title: Source Code Repository Scan
description: An analyst must configure a Static Application Security Testing (SAST) tool to automatically scan a source code repository for vulnerabilities on every new commit.

tasks.description: Integrate the SAST tool with the source code repository (e.g., GitHub, GitLab).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully sets up the integration between the two systems.

tasks.description: Configure a webhook to trigger a new SAST scan every time a developer pushes a new code commit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly configures the automated scan trigger.

tasks.description: Configure the system to automatically fail the build and create a ticket if the scan discovers any new critical vulnerabilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully implements a 'break the build' security check in the CI/CD pipeline.
